EmailTemplate.name: 2018 Dealer Update #11.2018 Dealer Update #11
EmailTemplate.subject: Honeywell Sales Bulletin Updates
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Sales Bulletin | July 2018
Primus EPIC Wi-Fi Ready Data Loader for Business Aircraft
- This sales bulletin provides pricing incentives for the new wireless data loader. - Here is Honeywell Sales Bulletin 2018-09 Rev A <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2018-09 REV A Primus EPIC Wi-Fi Ready Data Loader for Business Aircraft.pdf]]>. - Dealers can find 2018 sales bulletins in the Honeywell Aerospace Website <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> or in MyAerospace <[[http://goaero.honeywell.com/uNZ0000I0q0G0y02I00QXr0]]>/Parts & Repairs/Downloads/Sales Bulletins.
DU-875 Display Upgrade for All Platforms
- This sales bulletin provides updated pricing and product information for DU-875 liquid crystal display upgrades. - Here is Honeywell Sales Bulletin 2018-10 Rev D. - Dealers can find 2018 sales bulletins in the Honeywell Aerospace Website <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> or in MyAerospace <[[http://goaero.honeywell.com/uNZ0000I0q0G0y02I00QXr0]]>/Parts & Repairs/Downloads/Sales Bulletins
Frequency Change for SITA North America
- This sales bulletin provides an upgrade path for operators to utilize the new frequency. - Here is Honeywell Sales Bulletin 2018-31. <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2018-31%20AFIS DMU Sita Change.pdf]]> - Dealers can find 2018 sales bulletins in the Honeywell Aerospace Website <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> or in MyAerospace <[[http://goaero.honeywell.com/uNZ0000I0q0G0y02I00QXr0]]>/Parts & Repairs/Downloads/Sales Bulletins
Click here <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/Subscription_Page.html]]> to sign up for Honeywell Aerospace email communications.
